mapper.update: update app_chart_of_account set chart_of_account_id = #{chartOfAccountId}, account_sub_class_id = #{accountSubClassId}, account_no = #{accountNo}, account_name = #{accountName}, is_cash_or_bank = #{isCashOrBank}, is_not_active = #{isNotActive}, currency_id = #{currencyId}, department_id = #{departmentId}, normal_balance = #{normalBalance} where chart_of_account_id = #{chartOfAccountId};
